item.title: Some tips when build blog with hugo
item.description: Translate By ChatGPT. After several attempts and giving up, I finally decided to pick up my personal blog again. On the one hand, I hope to share some of my thoughts on work and life with everyone, and on the other hand, I also want to exercise my writing ability. Work well with tools As a tool enthusiast, I always have difficulty choosing tools. Considering that the main purpose of
